author¶

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

author_id¶
content¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

created_at¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

president.tests module¶

president.urls module¶

president.views module¶

president.views.about(request)[source]¶

Renders the ‘About’ page of the site.

president.views.blog_detail(request, post_id)[source]¶

Displays the details of a specific blog post based on its ID.

president.views.blog_list(request)[source]¶

Displays a list of all blog posts.

president.views.contact(request)[source]¶

Handles the contact form. If a POST request is made, returns a response thanking the user. Otherwise, displays the contact form.

president.views.create_post(request)[source]¶

Allows authenticated users to create a new post. Saves the post and redirects to the index page upon submission.

president.views.index(request)[source]¶

Displays the home page with a list of posts and user authentication status.

president.views.login_view(request)[source]¶

Handles user login using an authentication form. If valid, logs the user in and redirects to the index page.

president.views.logout_view(request)[source]¶

Logs out the current user and redirects to the index page.

president.views.post_detail(request, post_id)[source]¶

Displays the details of a specific post based on its ID.

president.views.register(request)[source]¶

Handles user registration using a user creation form. Logs the user in upon successful registration and redirects to the index page.
